channel.title: AVG detected bms.exe as a threat
channel.description:
I was playing BM, saved my game and quit. When i saw my desktop, AVG opened a window saying: [attach=4000,none,503][/attach]
I clicked on more info, it opened a website saying more about the threat. Type Unknown it said.I added the executable as an exception in the AVG.
It is probably nothing, but i guess it's for the best you guys have this in case of future problems like these. ![BM AVG.png|503x319](upload://cde8iJYcsfOzeUu0wZqF7lJYrnR.png)
